General.Name: Tongqinglou Dining Co Ltd
General.Description: Tongqinglou Catering Co., Ltd. provides catering services in China. It is also involved in the banquet and wedding, hotel accommodation, and restaurant businesses. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Hefei, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yiqin  Fan
1.Title: CFO, Deputy MD, Deputy GM, Sec. & Director
